agent_utterance: 목표가 5.00로 보이는데 이 수치가 무엇을 의미하는지 먼저 알려주실래요? 또한 현재 식사 습관이나 선호, 알레르기 같은 정보를 함께 알려주면 제가 어떻게 도와드릴지 더 잘 방향성을 잡을 수 있어요.
user_utterance: I'm sticking with the plan most days and aiming for regular meals, even when things get busy. Any tips for handling cravings and overeating during stressful moments?

agent_utterance: Nice work sticking to regular meals—during stressful moments, do you notice any specific cravings or triggers? I can offer simple, quick strategies (pause, water, and a small protein snack) and tailor them to your daily stressors and meals.
user_utterance: Got it, I'll keep working on sticking to my plan and recognizing triggers before they lead to big meals.

agent_utterance: You're doing great—keep the momentum. Today aim for a 4/5 effort on craving management: pause briefly when cravings hit, drink a glass of water, and choose a small protein snack only if you’re still hungry after a short pause. Small, steady steps beat big swings. You’ve got this in Suwon.
user_utterance: Thanks for the steady guidance. I’m sticking with the plan, even though my appetite still fluctuates; I’ll keep following the routine you suggested.
